### Assassin

_A black-cloaked, skulking killer._

**LV** 8, **AL** C
**AC** 15 (leather), **HP** 38, **MV** near (climb)
**ATK** 2 poisoned dagger (close/near) +6 (2d4)

|  S  |  D  |  C  |  I  |  W  |  Ch  |
|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:----:|
| 2 | 4 | 2 | 2 | 3 | 3 |

**Execute:** Deals x3 damage against surprised targets.
